Hong Konger moving to Vancouver
Anonymous (ID: 6BLGhQSg) 10/22/18(Mon)00:27:47
So i'm moving to Vancouver, BC next week. I am Chinese and I hear a lot of things regarding this city such as us taking it over.

Is Vancouver really a Chinese colony that i've been hearing about, I feel like its quite exaggerated.

Also, any general tips about living in Vancouver or Canada in General.

thanks!

[One Will Against Colonialism — One Nation Towards Independence]

It is all thanks to the support of one and all within the pro-independence camp that, within barely half a year since the founding of the HKNP, the support for the idea of our city's independence has grown surely and steadily. The HKNP is all too understanding of this.
